verbose_text: 9 In addition, an evaluation of the influence of STZ induced diabetes on renal pO 2 and blood flow, using invasive microprobes and BOLD-MRI, 10 suggested that hypoxic changes are not dependent on blood flow until 28 days after induction of diabetes, and these changes can be detected as early as 2 days in rat kidneys by BOLD-MRI.
evidence: STZ-induced diabetes on renal pO 2  and blood flow, using invasive microprobes and BOLD-MRI
